title: Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 2131 and H.R. 3593 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




October 09, 2009

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 2131 and H.R. 3593




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Press Secretary  ___________________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                                        October 9, 2009 STATEMENT BY THE PRESS SECRETARY  On Friday, October 9, 2009, the President signed into law: H.R. 2131, which reauthorizes the United States Advisory Commission on Public Diplomacy and amends the Foreign Affairs Reform and Restructuring Act of 1998; and H.R. 3593, which amends the United States International Broadcasting Act of 1994 and extends the operation of Radio Free Asia for one year.
